purpose: The email announces open faculty positions for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professors in the Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon. It invites applications from candidates with expertise in various areas of computer science, including Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering. The selection process emphasizes research ability and collaboration, with specific requirements for both tenure-track and tenured-level applicants. Interested candidates are instructed on how to apply, with a deadline for first-stage applications set for May 29, 2025.
evidence_sentences: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon invites applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor faculty positions in Computer Science.
We are primarily interested in recruiting excellent candidates in the areas of the department’s research groups on Computer Systems, Intelligent Systems, Multimodal Systems, and Software Systems.
Exceptional candidates in other areas of Computer Science will also be considered.
The selection process focuses on a candidate's proven research ability and dedication, and how their expertise complements the Department’s established strengths.
For full consideration, first-stage applications must be received by *May 29, 2025*.
